profile.name: MD. SABBIR HOSHEN
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.about: I'm a passionate developer with expertise in Python development and Android web development. My projects reflect my dedication to creating innovative solutions and user-friendly applications. In addition to my technical skills, I bring a strong problem-solving mindset and a commitment to delivering high-quality software. I thrive on tackling challenges and constantly expanding my knowledge in the ever-evolving world of technology.

services.name: Python Development
services.description: I specialize in Python development, creating robust and efficient applications. Whether it's web development, data analysis, or automation, I provide solutions that leverage Python's versatility to meet your needs.

services.name: Android App Development
services.description: I specialize in Android app development, creating engaging and user-friendly mobile applications. From concept to deployment, I ensure your app meets the highest standards of performance and usability.

services.name: Java Development
services.description: I specialize in Java development, creating robust and scalable software solutions. From enterprise applications to Android apps, I leverage the power of Java to meet your development needs.

services.name: Freelance Services
services.description: I provide freelance services, offering a wide range of professional solutions to clients worldwide. From web development to software projects, I'm here to help you achieve your goals.

services.name: Flask Web Development
services.description: I specialize in Flask web development, creating dynamic and responsive web applications with Python. From building RESTful APIs to crafting full-stack solutions, I bring your web ideas to life using Flask.

services.name: OpenCV
services.description: I specialize in OpenCV image processing, leveraging computer vision to analyze and manipulate images and videos. From object detection to facial recognition, I bring the power of OpenCV to solve visual problems.

portfolio.description: A Python command-line tool for sending HTTP requests with different data types to a server.
Code repository for Unity game projects.

portfolio.projectName: Android Project for Earning Money from Google Ads
portfolio.description: An Android project designed to generate revenue through Google Ads.
A cheat tool for GTA built using Python.

testimonials.name: Monchi
testimonials.testimonial: Md. Sabbir H. (@PyScripter) is an outstanding Android app developer. His depth of knowledge, attention to detail, and commitment to excellence made our app development journey seamless. Highly recommended for any Android-related projects!

testimonials.name: josephjakpa
testimonials.testimonial: Sabbir has a good command of Python language. He understood the task and delivered in record time. He provided support even after delivery. I am very pleased with his work. Would recommend and definitely work with him again.
